history.content:
<md>Are you a student who wants to build the future of Web3 and DeFi?   
  
**JOIN** [**OUTLIERS 2022**](http://outliers.build/) **to learn from legendary crypto founders, top venture capitalists, and talented peers.**  
  
This summer program, hosted by Floodgate and Standard Crypto, empowers student builders to gain integral Web3 knowledge, skills, and community.  
  
Leveling up from “crypto curious” to “crypto legend” isn’t easy, but this crash course will equip you with the tools and resources to build a successful Web3 venture. Students are matched with expert mentors and interact with world-class guests like the founders of Solana and Starkware.  
  
The small, highly selective cohort will meet for 10 weeks over the summer, culminating in a Project Showcase and Fall Retreat. [Hear more about the experience from last year’s Outliers!](https://youtu.be/RQSs8LB7MY4)  
  
Applications for Outliers are OPEN and **DUE Friday, April 15th at 11:59pm PT!**  
  
_Accelerate your Web3 education, connect with elite industry mentors, and (maybe even) meet your future co-founder_… Visit [https://www.outliers.build](https://www.outliers.build/) for more information.</md>
history.subject: Join Floodgate Outliers 2022!
